LanguageData.TuskPot.label: Colmillo
LanguageData.TuskPot.description: Diseñado por el honorable Shinzhor de Shinzaram, este cuerno encantador ofrece una alternativa encantadora para plantar sus flores adentro.
LanguageData.TuskPot_Blueprint.label: tusk pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Blueprint_Install.label: tusk pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Frame.label: tusk pot (building)
LanguageData.TuskPot_Frame.description: Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.LongPlantPot.label: Maceta (Grande)
LanguageData.LongPlantPot.description: Una olla de planta que puede contener flores decorativas para mejorar el estado de ánimo de las personas cercanas.
LanguageData.LongPlantPot_Blueprint.label: long plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.LongPlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: long plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.LongPlantPot_Frame.label: long plant pot (building)
LanguageData.LongPlantPot_Frame.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.label: Cinco Macetas en una
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot.description: ¡Las rosas son rojas, las violetas son azules, nosotros amamos nuestro pote del penta, y usted también!
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Blueprint.label: penta plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: penta plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Frame.label: penta plant pot (building)
LanguageData.PentaPlantPot_Frame.description: Roses are red, violets are blue, we love our Penta Pot, and so will you!
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall.label: Paleta
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall.description: Esta permitirá que varios recursos a granel, tales como metal y madera, se apilen mucho más denso de lo que el suelo permitiría.
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall_Frame.label: pallet (building)
LanguageData.Storage_WoodenPalletSmall_Frame.descript: The pallet will allow various bulk resources, such as metal and wood, to be stacked much denser than the ground would otherwise allow.
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig.label: Salto
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig.description: Los saltos son dispositivos de almacenamiento industriales de gran capacidad, que permiten que los recursos a granel, como el metal y la madera, se apilen más densos, incluso más densos que en la paleta.
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Blueprint.label: skip (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Frame.label: skip (building)
LanguageData.Storage_SkipBig_Frame.description: Skips are heavy-duty, industrial grade storage devices, allowing bulk resources such as metal and wood to be stacked denser, even denser than the pallet.
LanguageData.Pot.label: Maceta
LanguageData.Pot.description: Una olla grande hecha de madera o cerámica; Utilizado para preservar los alimentos. Reduce el proceso de pudrición en un 25%. Hasta 4 artículos.
LanguageData.Pot_Blueprint.label: pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.Pot_Blueprint_Install.label: pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.label: pot (building)
LanguageData.Pot_Frame.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 25%. Up to 4 items.
LanguageData.Basket.label: Cesta
LanguageData.Basket.description: Una canasta de cuero o textil. Usado para guardas cosas varias dentro. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Basket_Blueprint.label: basket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Basket_Blueprint_Install.label: basket (blueprint)
LanguageData.Basket_Frame.label: basket (building)
LanguageData.Basket_Frame.description: A basket made of leather or textile. Used to store various things inside. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Barrel.label: Barril
LanguageData.Barrel.description: Un barril de madera o metal. Usado para guardas cosas varias dentro. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Barrel_Blueprint.label: barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.Barrel_Blueprint_Install.label: barrel (blueprint)
LanguageData.Barrel_Frame.label: barrel (building)
LanguageData.Barrel_Frame.description: A barrel made of wood or metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Chest.label: Cofre
LanguageData.Chest.description: Un cofre de metal. Usado para guardas cosas varias dentro. Hasta 5 artículos.
LanguageData.Chest_Blueprint.label: chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chest_Blueprint_Install.label: chest (blueprint)
LanguageData.Chest_Frame.label: chest (building)
LanguageData.Chest_Frame.description: A chest made of metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.ClutterShelf.label: Estante
LanguageData.ClutterShelf.description: Este estante almacena textiles, cueros e ingredientes textiles crudos. Hasta 6 artículos.
LanguageData.ClutterShelf_Blueprint.label: shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterShelf_Blueprint_Install.label: shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterShelf_Frame.label: shelf (building)
LanguageData.ClutterShelf_Frame.description: This shelf stores textiles, leathers and raw textile ingridients. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack.label: Refrigerador
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack.description: Almacena la comida. Hasta 5 artículos. Este requiere energía para mantener los alimentos refrigerados.
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack_Blueprint.label: fridge (blueprint)
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack_Frame.label: fridge (building)
LanguageData.RefrigeratedTrayRack_Frame.description: Stores food. Up to 5 items. This track rack requires power in order to keep food refrigerated.
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable.label: Mesa de servicio
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable.description: Una pequeña mesa que se utiliza para almacenar todo tipo de comidas. Hasta 5 artículos. Disminuye el proceso de pudrición.
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable_Blueprint.label: serving table (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable_Frame.label: serving table (building)
LanguageData.ClutterSmallServingTable_Frame.descripti: A small table that is used for storing all kinds of meals. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet.label: Botiquín
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet.description: Almacena la medicina y los ingredientes médicos crudos; Previene el deterioro. Hasta 5 artículos. Disminuye el proceso de pudrición.
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet_Blueprint.label: medicine cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet_Frame.label: medicine cabinet (building)
LanguageData.Storage_MedicineCabinet_Frame.descriptio: Stores medicine and raw medical ingridients; prevents deterioration. Up to 5 items. Decrease rotting process.
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.label: Caja militar
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer.description: Almacena armas, partes de armas, cajas de armas, municiones y prendas de vestir; Previene el deterioro. Hasta 7 artículos.
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Blueprint.label: military box (blueprint)
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Frame.label: military box (building)
LanguageData.Storage_HazMatContainer_Frame.descriptio: Stores weapons, weapon parts, weapon crates, ammo and apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 7 items.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.label: Armario.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.description: Almacena armas, partes de armas, cajas de armas, municiones y prendas de vestir; Previene el deterioro. Hasta 6 artículos.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Blueprint.label: locker (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Blueprint_Install.label: locker (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Frame.label: locker (building)
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA_Frame.description: Stores weapons, weapon parts, weapon crates, ammo and apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 6 items.
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA.label: lámpara de piso
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA.description: Una sencilla lámpara de pie. Requiere 80 W.
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Blueprint.label: floor lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Frame.label: floor lamp (building)
LanguageData.ClutterFloorLampA_Frame.description: A simple floor lamp. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.CeilingLamp.label: Lámpara de techo
LanguageData.CeilingLamp.description: Una lámpara de techo que ilumina un área. Deben colocarse bajo un techo. Requiere 80 W.
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Blueprint.label: ceiling lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: ceiling lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Frame.label: ceiling lamp (building)
LanguageData.CeilingLamp_Frame.description: A ceiling lamp that lights an area. Must be placed under a roof. Requires 80 W.
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: torch lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BowlLamp.label: Lámpara de cuenco
LanguageData.BowlLamp.description: Un pequeño fuego brillante y cálido, perfectamente contenido en un cuenco.
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Blueprint.label: bowl lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: bowl lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Frame.label: bowl lamp (building)
LanguageData.BowlLamp_Frame.description: A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl.
LanguageData.WallTorch.label: Antorcha de pared
LanguageData.WallTorch.description: Una antorcha montada en la pared para iluminar un área. Puede ser reabastecido automáticamente con madera. No es una buena fuente de calor. Debe colocarse en una pared.
LanguageData.WallTorch_Blueprint.label: wall torch (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Blueprint_Install.label: wall torch (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Frame.label: wall torch (building)
LanguageData.WallTorch_Frame.description: A wall mounted torch for lighting an area. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Not a good source of heat. Must be placed on a wall.
LanguageData.Candle.label: Vela
LanguageData.Candle_Blueprint.label: candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.Candle_Blueprint_Install.label: candle (blueprint)
LanguageData.Candle_Frame.label: candle (building)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp.label: Lámpara Piedra brillante
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp.description: Una hermosa lámpara coronada con piedra brillante, que emite la luz reflejada de una docena de rayos. Fuente de luz libre.
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Blueprint.label: glowstone lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: glowstone lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Frame.label: glowstone lamp (building)
LanguageData.GlowstoneLamp_Frame.description: A beautiful lamp topped with glowstone, emitting reflected light from dozen of glowstones. Free source of light.
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp.label: Lámpara de tierra al aire libre
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp.description: Una pequeña lámpara de tierra que es accionada por el sol. Enciende una pequeña área al aire libre.
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Blueprint.label: outdoor ground lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Frame.label: outdoor ground lamp (building)
LanguageData.OutdoorGroundLamp_Frame.description: A small ground lamp that is powered by the sun. It lights a small area outdoors.
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp.label: Camino, luz
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp.description: Pequeña luz con construido en el panel solar que ilumina un área.
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Blueprint.label: path light (blueprint)
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Frame.label: path light (building)
LanguageData.Lighting_PathLamp_Frame.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area.
LanguageData.WallLamp.label: Lámpara de pared
LanguageData.WallLamp.description: Una lámpara que se debe colocar contra una pared de soporte. Requiere 100 W. Tiene un brillo mayor que la mayoría de las luces.
LanguageData.WallLamp_Blueprint.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Frame.label: wall lamp (building)
LanguageData.WallLamp_Frame.description: A lamp that must be placed against a supporting wall. Requires 100 W. It has a bigger glow than most lights.
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight.label: luz de pared
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight.description: Una luz pequeña que se debe colocar en una pared de soporte. Requiere 70 W.
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Blueprint.label: wall light (blueprint)
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Frame.label: wall light (building)
LanguageData.Lighting_WallLight_Frame.description: A small light that must be placed on a supporting wall. Requires 70 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare.label: square floor light (white)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blueprint.label: square floor light (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blueprint_Install.label: square floor light (white) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Frame.label: square floor light (white) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red.label: Luz cuadrada del piso (rojo)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red.description: Una luz de planta cuadrada integrada en el suelo con una lámpara roja. Impermeable y bastante linda. Requiere 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Blueprint.label: square floor light (red) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Frame.label: square floor light (red) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Red_Frame.description: A square floor light integraded into the ground with a red lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green.label: Luz cuadrada del piso (verde)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green.description: Una luz de planta cuadrada integrada en el suelo con una lámpara verde. Impermeable y bastante linda. Requiere 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Blueprint.label: square floor light (green) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Frame.label: square floor light (green) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Green_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a green lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue.label: Luz cuadrada del piso (azul)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue.description: Una luz cuadrada integrada en el suelo con una lámpara azul. Impermeable y bastante linda. Requiere 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Blueprint.label: square floor light (blue) (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Frame.label: square floor light (blue) (building)
LanguageData.FloorLightSquare_Blue_Frame.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a blue lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.
LanguageData.FloorAddonA.label: Marcador de zona
LanguageData.FloorAddonA.description: Simple losa de acero con un poco de pintura en ella.
LanguageData.FloorAddonA_Blueprint.label: Zone marker (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorAddonA_Blueprint_Install.label: Zone marker (blueprint)
LanguageData.FloorAddonA_Frame.label: Zone marker (building)
LanguageData.FloorAddonA_Frame.description: Simple slab of steel with some paint on it.
